description: Are you ready to be flooded with compliments?Get hair and skin you can be proud of, in 7 days or less!Is there is a reason that everyone is talking about NYGLOW Argan Oil? Yes!Our Argan oil does not just soften and hydrate your hair... By combining nature's most effective moisturizer with fatty acids, your hair and skin will be silk smooth.It is no wonder that celebrities are raving about 100% pure Argan oil! - The secret is out! - So what do Taylor Swift, Angelina Jolie and Kim Kardashian have in common? You guessed it! They all use Argan Oil, even describing it as their "secret" daily skin and haircare weapon.WARNING: not all Argan Oils are the same quality!Sadly, as millions of women turn to Argan Oil because of its many benefits, many companies are using the Oil's name to sell sub-standard cosmetics. Often these so called "Argan Oils" only contain a small amount of real oil. By diluting, over processing and adding nasty filler "oils", companies are able to charge a lower price and trick you into thinking they are still getting the real thing!DON'T be fooled!At NYGLOW we only bottle the purest oil. All our Argan oil is hand extracted by the local Berber women of Morocco, deep in the heart of North Africa.Only 150 bottles of NYGLOW Argan Oil are available at the discounted price shown each monthAdd to Cart - Before We Run Out of Stock!
title: 100% Pure Argan Oil for Hair, Face, Skin and Nails by NYGLOW - The #1 New Premium Moroccan Leave-in Treatment to Condition and Revitalize Damaged Lifeless Hair, Nourish Dry Skin and Strengthen Brittle Nails - Natural, Cold Pressed, Certified Organic, Extra Virgin Moroccan Oil - 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
